你愿意嫁给他

你疯了吗？

translation.en: or what just happened, but I know on some level

凯特·瓦尔德兹和巴斯蒂安

You need anything?

-[Kat sobs] -It's all right.

I promise.
We'll figure it out.

Hang up and turn that off.
I got to go.
God, he's unbelievable.
What now?

善良、正直的单身父亲

translation.en: Or...
Or?
Or I could stay married to him.

You're kidding?

Yeah, we got to get out in front of this.

-你这种态度是没可能
-那就不必

我们绝不会侵害到你的生活

-Hey, Kat. -Hi.
Would you do me a favor,
uh, just two seconds, and just say, -"Roxy, you really blew it"?

-[whispers] Sorry. -[Melissa] They want, uh, um...

Charlie in studio and Kat remote from London.

简单 周一到周五八点到三点

什么？不好意思

-This is not my world. -It's natural.

-但那不是全部…

translation.en: I feel it's kind of a distorted reality.
I'm so glad I came to your TED Talk.
translation.zh: 谢谢你富有深意的演讲

translation.en: No, come on. I see it all the time in my students.
translation.zh:
不 拜托
我在学生身上看得清清楚楚

translation.en: -It... [sighs] -[Melissa] Kat's ready.
Okay, she's ready. [Colin] Social media can also reach people.
translation.zh:
-好 她准备好了
-社交媒体也能触达人群

translation.en: -No, I know. Yeah. -It can be a tool.
You know what a tool is, Charlie?
translation.zh: 你知道什么是工具吧 查理？

translation.en: -Okay. Thank you, Melissa. -[Parker] Burn.
translation.zh:
-好 谢谢你 梅莉莎
-讥讽啊

translation.en: I know this is a lot.
Just be yourself.
Myself probably wouldn't be here, but...
translation.zh: 我可能做不了自己 但…

translation.en: Listen, if you don't want to do this...
translation.zh: 听着 如果你不想做这事的话… 怎么？我能走吗？

translation.en: Uh, what, then I leave?
-You said he was into this. -[Colin] He is.
translation.zh:
你不是说他同意了吗？ -是啊
-居然当我的面说谎

translation.en: He can hear you.
[Colin] Ladies and gentlemen, Kat Valdez and her new husband,
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 欢迎凯特·瓦尔德兹与她的新婚丈夫

translation.en: Charlie Gilbert.
[reporter] You think it's romantic marrying a complete stranger?
translation.zh:
你觉得嫁给一个
完全陌生的人很浪漫？

translation.en: Uh, impulsive, without a plan.
translation.zh: 这是冲动 事先没有计划

translation.en: But, hey, look where my plans got me.
translation.zh: 但看看计划给我带来了什么好处

translation.en: So, you just threw caution to the wind and thought...
translation.zh: 所以你就这样 把谨慎抛到九霄云外…

translation.en: I didn't think, actually.
It was a moment.
You're banking a lifetime on a moment?
translation.zh: 你把一辈子托付给了一瞬间？

translation.en: No, I'm banking a moment on a moment.
translation.zh: 不 我只托付了那一瞬间

translation.en: Get enough of those, and that's a lifetime.
translation.zh: 若有很多那样的瞬间 就是一辈子

translation.en: You know nothing about each other.
-Did you think twice? -Charlie?
translation.zh: 你认真思考过吗？ 查理？

translation.en: Mm, people meet randomly all the time.
-At a... at a bar or... -Online.
translation.zh: 比如在酒吧或… 在网上

translation.en: Yeah, online, at 7-Eleven.
translation.zh: 对 在网上 在711便利店

translation.en: I mean, why is this any crazier?
translation.zh: 这并不比那些更疯狂呀

translation.en: To state the obvious, you got married.
Yeah, and...
Now we get to know each other.
translation.zh: 现在我们可以开始互相了解

translation.en: -But not as man and wife? -[Kat] Uh, no.
That would be nuts. [chuckles]
Just for her.
For me, it would be pretty amazing.
translation.zh: 对我来说 就棒呆了

translation.en: Last night, I held up a friend's sign asking a woman to marry me,
translation.zh: 昨晚 我举着我朋友的牌子 让一个女人与我结婚

translation.en: and she said yes, and I did, and...
translation.zh: 她答应了 我就娶了她

translation.en: ...you know, I did it not,
you know, because she was beautiful--
-well, maybe a little... -[laughter]
...um, but it just seemed like,
in the moment, the right thing to do.
So, what, you just saw each other and said yes?
translation.zh: 所以你们刚见面就同意结婚了？

translation.en: [both laugh] Yes.
And that doesn't seem frivolous?
Historically, marriage was transactional.
translation.zh: 历史上 婚姻是交易

translation.en: It was about expanding your empire,
and a woman's value was based on what she brought.
translation.zh:
一个女人的价值
建立在她带来的东西上

translation.en: Like, "You give me a heifer, and I'll give you my daughter."
translation.zh: 类似于用女儿换小母牛

translation.en: [Charlie] It's terrible.
That's... Uh, you know, I didn't come up with it.
But it really was a business deal,
translation.zh: 不过 婚姻确实曾是商业交易

translation.en: and it wasn't designed to be about love,
and maybe that's where people kind of get tripped up now.
translation.zh: 现代人可能就是没认识到这点

translation.en: [reporter] This is your second marriage, right, Charlie?

translation.en: You wouldn't want to fail again.
Well, you haven't lived unless you've failed, Bill.
translation.zh: 比尔 有失败 才算真正活过

translation.en: You should know that from your time at CNBC.
translation.zh: 凭你在贵频道的经历 你应该知道

translation.en: Listen, what we did was crazy--
translation.zh: 听着 我们做的事很疯狂

translation.en: we know that-- but, you know,
it was just truly a leap of faith.
The rules as they exist pretty much suck for women.
translation.zh: 现世规则对女人来说很糟糕

translation.en: I mean, why do we have to wait for men to propose?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要等男人求婚？

translation.en: Why is everything on his terms?
translation.zh: 为什么一切都照他的意思来？

translation.en: No, I think it is time to shake things up.
translation.zh: 我觉得是时候改变一下了

translation.en: How about this? We pick the guy,
translation.zh: 这样如何 我们选一个男人

translation.en: we keep our name and let him earn the right to stay.
translation.zh:
我们保留娘家姓氏
让他自己争取留下来的权利

translation.en: -[Colin] That was terrific. -[Kat chuckling]
No, no, seriously. Oh, and listen.
translation.zh: 不 说真的 听着

translation.en: Don't worry about Tuesday.
We'll adjust our schedule around yours.
-I appreciate it. -Of course.
-[Kat] We'll try not to turn your life upside down.
translation.zh:
-不客气 当然
-我们会尽量 不太影响你的生活

translation.en: I think it might be a little too late for that.
I mean, do you ever get used to this?
Just the attention and the chaos and the people everywhere?
translation.zh:
到处被人关注
被人围观 引起骚乱？

translation.en: I don't know. Some days, you barely notice.
translation.zh: 我不知道 有些时候 你注意不到

translation.en: Other days, you feel like... a panda in a zoo.
translation.zh:
有时你又会觉得
自己是动物园里的熊猫

translation.en: You should know that up front.
Got it.
Where you off to now?
Oh, London, for a meeting.
And I'm off to Flatbush for a dog,
translation.zh: 我要去弗拉特布什接狗

translation.en: which pretty much sums it up.
I'll see you at the next photo op?
-Okay. -[engine starts]
Don't forget to check your schedule.
I got it.
OMG. He can't even text with that.
translation.zh: 我的天 那玩意儿都发不了短信

translation.en: OMG. Yes, he can.
[whispers] But very slowly.
Ay, ay, ay.
[Parker] You did not look nervous, and you kind of have
translation.zh:
你看起来并不紧张 你知道吗？
其实你长得还挺标新立异的

translation.en: offbeat good looks for...
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
其实你长得还挺标新立异的

translation.en: -Offbeat? -[Paparazzi] Charlie Valdez!
-Charlie! -What are they doing here?
Relax. We're famous now.
translation.zh: 放松 我们现在是名人

translation.en: [Paparazzi] Is this a throuple?
Why don't you live with your wife?
translation.zh: 你老婆呢？为什么不跟她一起住？

translation.en: Why are you yelling at me?
-I'm standing right here. -Come on, Charlie.
translation.zh:
-我就站在你面前
-拜托 查理

translation.en: [Parker] Just, um...
-Are you now Mr. Valdez? -Are you in the doghouse? Huh?
translation.zh:
-就…
-你入赘了？ 你生气了吗？

translation.en: [grunting] It's a short walk.
Go inside. I'll deal with this.
translation.zh: 就走一小段 进去吧 我来处理

translation.en: [Paparazzi] You been kicked out already?
The dog can't shit if people are watching.
translation.zh: 那只狗…如果被人看着 就没法拉屎

translation.en: Luckily, I can only shit if people are watching,
translation.zh: 幸好我是要被人看着才能撒泼

translation.en: so if you're feeling lucky...
I'm busy, too, by the way.
[Bastian on video] What's your name, baby?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字 宝贝？

translation.en: -[woman on video] Janice. -[Bastian] Janice.
You look so sexy tonight.
[Kat] I don't know about you, but when I get up, I like to meditate.
translation.zh: 不清楚你们的情况 但我早上起床后喜欢冥想

translation.en: I also love to have fresh juice.

translation.en: So I like to juice daily with my Vitamix.
translation.zh:
所以我每天都会
用维他密斯搅拌机榨果汁…

translation.en: Could we get a Vitamix?
translation.zh: 我们能买一台维他密斯搅拌机吗？

translation.en: I'd like to juice daily.
Come on. Put that down.
-No electronics at dinner. -What do you call that?
translation.zh:
-晚餐不准出现电子产品
-这叫什么？

translation.en: I call that a nature documentary,
so we can travel while we eat.
Put it down.
So, is Kat, like, my stepmom?
No, Lou. Come on.
Dad, I think this experience is actually really good for you.

translation.en: Says my 12-year-old?
It's true. I mean, you never just, like,
do things without planning them.

translation.en: I think it's cool.
I really want to meet her.
I mean, Parker says she's nice
and smart and next-level hot.
She is nice. She is... She's an attract...

translation.en: Here, let me get this.
Dad, she just hit 80 million followers on Instagram.

爸爸 最近她在照片墙上的粉丝数
达到了八千万

translation.en: I'm not impressed. Talk to me when she gets to 90 million, okay?

translation.en: Lou, it's not real.
It's all a facade.
You know, they had me wearing makeup.
You wear makeup now?

translation.en: Well, you never say never, but I don't plan on it

translation.en: in the next couple months that we're doing this.

translation.en: I don't think Mom would want that.

translation.en: Actually, Mom wants to meet her, too.
Oh, perfect. Lou, you know that we're not really together.

好极了 露
你知道我们没有真的在一起

I mean, it's-- it's just for scheduling.
They're making me use it.
-Huh. -Yeah, bowling,
translation.zh: 他们逼我用的 看 保龄球

translation.en: and then we'll do a photo shoot, so...
Uh-huh. But do you guys, like, talk ever?

translation.en: It's just publicity. It's not real.

translation.en: Yeah! Come on!
Okay, your turn.
Don't be nervous. It's just, uh...

translation.en: Uh, okay, no. I'm guessing from the way you're holding that
translation.zh: 好 不对 从你拿球的动作看

translation.en: -that you haven't done too much bowling. -Uh, what do I do?
translation.zh:
-你没怎么打过保龄球吧
-我该怎么拿？

translation.en: Well, you... you're gonna want to put your fingers -in the holes there. -Yeah.
Get your thumb in that one.
translation.zh:
-对 把你的大拇指放进去
-这里？

translation.en: -There? That one? Okay. -Yep. Then take three steps kind of--
translation.zh:
-对 把你的大拇指放进去
-这里？ -那个吗？好
-对 然后… 走三步 最后一步左脚在前

translation.en: you want to land on your left, and don't be afraid to use those little...
translation.zh: 走三步 最后一步左脚在前 借助那些小东西…

translation.en: A strike is better than a spare, right?

translation.en: -That is not your first time bowling. -[laughing]

translation.en: Yes! Did you get that?
translation.zh: 太好了 你拍到了吗？

translation.en: -Come on! The old rope-a-dope. -Yes!
translation.zh:
-拜托 以逸待劳的老套战术
-太好了

translation.en: [Melissa] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊 真希望我把它弄成付费内容

translation.en: I wish I put money on this, because people are loving it.
translation.zh: 天啊 真希望我把它弄成付费内容 大家都超喜欢的

translation.en: -What people? -Oh, well, this is
an Instagram live feed, and 237,000 people
translation.zh: 有二十三万七千人在说

translation.en: -are like, "Why is he such a boring nerd?" -Mel.
translation.zh:
“他怎么是个无聊的呆子？” -梅尔
-干吗？他们说的 又不是我

translation.en: -What? Their words, not mine. -Get off the live, Mel.
translation.zh:
-梅尔
-干吗？他们说的 又不是我 结束直播 梅尔

translation.en: All right.
So, we just need a little bit more B roll for The Today Show.

所以我们还要
给《今日秀》拍一点空镜

translation.en: Well, I've-- I've got to get home to Tank.
-Is Tank his daughter? -Stop.
-[Colin] Okay. -You have to go?
Yeah, if you guys are done with me.
translation.zh: 对 如果我这部分拍完了的话

translation.en: Mm-hmm. We're going to a party.
You go.
Where's home?
[Kat] Wow. Cool.
[Charlie] Thanks.
Yeah, it's a, um...
Kat, meet dog. [chuckling]
Wow, I never heard that one before.
Sorry. That was pretty... ruff.
translation.zh: 抱歉 那样听起来很“汪”

translation.en: [laughing] You are so lucky
that Mel didn't hear you say that.
No, I'm lucky Mel isn't here.
I feel like you're never alone.

translation.en: What? I'm alone now.
translation.zh: 什么？我现在身边就没人

translation.en: Well, I mean, yeah, other than Kofi.
[Kat] Just ignore him.
[Charlie] Is everything you do filmed?
translation.zh: 你做的所有事都要拍下来吗？

translation.en: -[Kat] Banked. -Banked?
For my channel.
Just little mini episodes of life.
Uh, can-can we skip an episode?
-Want me to go? -[Kat] Yeah, you can go.
translation.zh: 要我走吗？ 嗯 你走吧

translation.en: -I'll see you tomorrow. Happy? -I'll see you. Yeah.
Relieved.
[Kat] Is this your daughter?
-[Charlie] Yeah. -She's cute.
Thanks. Yeah, she's great.
translation.zh: 谢谢 对 她很棒

translation.en: Although she is in that awkward in-between phase
translation.zh: 但她到了某个尴尬的阶段

translation.en: where she's still my baby girl
translation.zh: 虽然她仍是我的宝贝女儿

translation.en: but she definitely wants nothing to do with me.
translation.zh: 不过 她想和我保持距离

translation.en: And you can forget about getting hugs,
'cause it's not happening anymore,
translation.zh: 因为她绝不会让我抱的

translation.en: which kind of breaks my heart, but that's the way it goes.

translation.en: What happened with her mom?
I mean, I'm sorry, you don't... You know, it's none of my business.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你可以不用… 这本来也就与我无关 你不用告诉我

translation.en: -You don't have to tell me. [chuckles] -No, no, it's okay. Um...
translation.zh: 这本来也就与我无关 你不用告诉我 不 没关系

translation.en: We were married, and we actually had a good marriage.
translation.zh: 我们的婚姻其实挺美满的

translation.en: You know, then,
all of a sudden, I got the feeling
she didn't want it or she didn't want me anymore,
translation.zh:
她不想继续了
或她不想跟我在一起了

translation.en: and I had nothing to do but let her go.
translation.zh: 我什么都做不了 只能让她走

translation.en: And, you know, statistically, we're screwed,
translation.zh: 从统计学上讲 我们的成功几率很低

translation.en: 'cause 48% of marriages end in divorce, so...
translation.zh: 因为48%的婚姻以离婚告终

translation.en: That means 52% work.
-Ah, an optimist. -[laughs]
-This is so cool. Can I? -Yeah.
And then I think when you get up to, like, second and third,
translation.zh:
我觉得
第二次和第三次婚姻的失败率

translation.en: then it jumps up to, like, 67% failure rate.
Even if it's one in a billion, what does it matter?
translation.zh: 就算是十亿分之一的几率又如何？

translation.en: It's worth a shot.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
I believe in marriage.
Jesus, still?
Haven't you been married like six times?
translation.zh: 你不是结过六次婚了吗？

translation.en: Three times.
Not including this. This is four.
translation.zh: 不包括这次 这是第四次

translation.en: But the first time was only 48 hours, so...
doesn't count.
But still, do you ever feel like just kind of,
"I'm waving the white flag on marriage. That's it."

translation.en: No, it's like math.
When you get a problem wrong, you just don't give up on it.

translation.en: You keep trying till you get it right.

translation.en: Mm, year and a half.
I'd just split from my second husband.

translation.en: He was a music producer who did, uh,
my last two albums and then sold a sex tape.

帮我做了上两张专辑
卖了一盘性爱录像带

translation.en: -[inhales sharply] -It's not the worst part. The worst part is I thought I could fix things.

这还不是最糟糕的
最糟糕的是 我以为我能修正一切

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Pretty hard to fix a sex tape.

translation.en: -Right. -[Tank grumbles]
Sorry. Yeah, it's just a little power nap.
translation.zh: 抱歉 它就是小憩一下

translation.en: -Pacing himself. [chuckles] -Mm.
If we give him a minute, he'll-he'll restart.
translation.zh: 给它一分钟 它会自动重启的

translation.en: -Okay. -But you were saying?
Well, this business, those type of guys,
-they build you up to break you down. -But you were already famous, so...
translation.zh:
他们那种人会帮你抬高身价
然后击垮你 但你已经很有名了

translation.en: It's not about fame.
You know, it's about credibility.
It just didn't matter how successful I was.

translation.zh: 他们从来…没给过我认可

translation.en: You know I've never been nominated for anything?
translation.zh: 你知道我从没被提名任何奖项吗？

translation.en: And then I met Bastian.
translation.zh: 然后我遇到了巴斯蒂安

translation.en: And he... and he gave me this.
"Sing." What does that mean?
It means "don't let them win."
Nobody's all bad, Charlie.

translation.en: If they were, it would make it so much easier.
translation.zh: 如果是的话 事情就简单多了

translation.en: But cheating on you with your assistant is pretty bad.
translation.zh: 但是背着你 跟你助理劈腿 非常坏

translation.en: [grunting] Okay.
Zoo mates.
Zoo mates.
See, we're not so different, Charlie.
translation.zh: 你看 我们没那么不同 查理

translation.en: Come on. Come on! It's not a big...
translation.zh: 拜托 不算什么大事

translation.en: [Colin] The Marciano brothers and Kat Valdez
translation.zh: 马其亚诺兄弟联手凯特·瓦尔德兹

translation.en: are telling the world there's no age limit.
translation.zh: 告诉世界年龄不该被限制

translation.en: -Is that right? -Guess so.
Think we've got everything we need. We'll post to our socials, you're all set.
translation.zh:
需要的东西都有了 我们会发到社交网站上去
你可以走了

translation.en: [sighs] All right. Maybe... Is it okay if I stay?
translation.zh: 好 不过 我可以留下来吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 不过 我可以留下来吗？ 可以 当然

translation.en: Make yourself at home.
-Bye. -Bye.
-Hey. -Hey, Mom.
How you doing?
There's a picture of you buying her a pregnancy test.
translation.zh: 有人拍到你给她买验孕棒

translation.en: -Charlie! -No.
No, that was a stool softener for Tank.
translation.zh: 不是 那是给坦克买的清肠通便片

translation.en: [reporter] Kat Valdez and her new husband, Charlie Gilbert.
translation.zh:
凯特·瓦尔德兹和她的新任丈夫
查理·吉尔伯特

translation.en: -Wh-- What do I do? -Just stand and smile.
-Charlie! Charlie! -[clamoring]
-Oh, my God, it's Bastian! -Bastian! Bastian!
translation.zh:
-天啊 是巴斯蒂安
